hiveArticle.title: #ColorChallenge - Tuesday Orange - A Flower
hiveArticle.body:
### <center>Namaste, Have a great day everyone. My entry for today's #colprchallenge by @kalemandra is an Orange Flower. This image was taken in my office where it was kept as a show piece.</center>
